page.title: 17RECREATION _ KEISS CHURCHES
page.content: {RECREATION} The centre of the village has a football pitch which is used by the Keiss Football Club, who play regular fixtures there in the summer. Children use this area for play, and also the nearby swing park. The Youth Club has up to 30 members meeting in its own hall. The Keiss Amenities Hall is used for dances,the Ladies Darts Club,Bowls,Shooting Clubs and the Hobbies Circle. The School hall is used by the Brownies, the Girl Guides, SWRI and the Badminton Club. The Hotel is a social gathering place. {CHURCHES}The area has 3 churches. Two are in the village - the Church of Scotland Parish Church which is a charge linked with Canisbay, and the Keiss Free Church. In both the number of attenders is much smaller than it used to be.
